name: Load_Location_Cluster_Part_Summary
action: <*CTX( Container(Location_Cluster_Part_Summary_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(Location_Cluster_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber   ) )*>
description: To load the part summary container from the part summary attribute. Always should run at last (rank highest)
